spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout deviations from the 2D plan: an extra enclosed room/corridor zone appears at the top-middle/right (not in plan) (E5). The right-side open Living/Dining area is re-partitioned and labeled incorrectly (Living Room missing; 'LINING ROOM' shown) (E1/E2). Entrance location is inconsistent: 2D entrance is centered on the bottom wall; 3D shows an exterior door opening near the bottom-right wall segment (E2). Several interior doors are added/relocated (not matching plan’s single bathroom door and limited interior openings) (E2/E5). Room proportions differ: bathroom and circulation areas are enlarged/reshaped relative to the compact central WC in plan (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are inconsistent: the plan shows a largely open right side (Dining above Living) with minimal partitioning; 3D introduces extra separating walls/rooms in the top-middle area (E5) affecting adjacency (E2). Missing room labeling/function: Living Room not represented as such (E1). Hallucinated/incorrectly embedded doors: multiple red doors appear along the central spine that do not correspond to the 2D door count/locations (E5/E2). Window pattern around perimeter does not match the 2D window distribution (E2). Wall thickness appears visually consistent, but the added partitions significantly reduce fidelity.

furniture_mapping.notes: Dining table/chairs are present in the right area (reasonable), but the 2D plan does not specify furniture; more importantly, the Living Room is not furnished/identified where expected (E1). Scale is generally plausible, but furniture placement cannot be validated against the sparse 2D furnishing cues.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is coherent and lighting is clean with good material readability. Geometry is mostly crisp. However, there are clarity issues due to incorrect/overlaid text labeling (e.g., 'LINING ROOM', large 'BATHROOM' text on floor) (E6) and the scene’s architectural changes reduce interpretability as a faithful isometric of the given plan.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated enclosed room/partition at the top-middle/right (with windows) not present in the 2D plan’s open Dining/Living layout.
Missing Living Room as a correctly labeled/defined space; 3D shows incorrect labeling ('LINING ROOM') and does not match the plan’s Dining + Living zoning.
Entrance/exterior door placement mismatch: plan entrance is bottom-center; 3D shows an exterior door opening near the bottom-right wall segment.
Interior door placement/count mismatch: 3D includes multiple doors along central circulation that do not correspond to the 2D plan’s door locations/orientations.
Window placement mismatch: 3D window distribution (notably large left wall window and top-middle windows) does not match the 2D plan’s perimeter window positions.
Proportion distortion: bathroom/circulation geometry differs from the compact central bathroom shown in the 2D plan, altering room sizes and shapes.
Rendering/label artifact: incorrect/oversized text on floors/walls (e.g., 'LINING ROOM', large 'BATHROOM' label) reduces clarity and implies mismapped rooms.
